name: designtypes
description: A questionnaire for finding out how you think about software design

scripts.build: npm run _mkdirs && npm run _php && npm run _babel && npm run _node_modules && npm run _writeVersion
scripts._node_modules: cp package.json dist/ && npm install --prefix dist/ --production
scripts._writeVersion: date --rfc-3339=seconds > dist/version && git rev-parse HEAD >> dist/version

author: Matthias Wittum and Christian Rehn
